Dropdown.style: visibility: hidden; width:0; display: inline-block; outline: none; cursor: pointer; font-size: 15px; line-height: 10px; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 8px; padding: 0px; border: none; transition: box-shadow 0.2s ease 0s, -ms-transform 0.1s ease 0s, -webkit-transform 0.1s ease 0s, transform 0.1s ease 0s; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(230, 30, 77) 0%, rgb(227, 28, 95) 50%, rgb(215, 4, 102) 100%); color: #fff; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 10px;

div.class: btn btn-light font-weight-normal border-0 d-flex flex-grow-1 align-items-center py-0 log_into pl-2 o_py
